TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit VerificationAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class VerificationAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class VerificationAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 定义 Web 内容可访问性规则的元数据特性。

span.span: Defines the metadata attribute of a Web content accessibility rule.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的实例定义可以验证的 Web 内容可访问性规则。An instance of the class defines a Web content accessibility rule that can be verified. 有关 Web 内容辅助功能准则的详细信息, 请参阅[万维网联合会 (W3C)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站。For more information on Web Content Accessibility Guidelines, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 定义实例所需的最少信息量包括:The minimal amount of information required to define an instance of a includes: - 验证规则表示的准则。A guideline that the verification rule represents. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 准则的检查点。A checkpoint of the guideline. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 检查点优先级。A checkpoint priority. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个枚举值, 该值表示应作为规则所属的报表级别。A enumeration value that represents the reporting level that should be rule belongs to. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 验证规则为 true 时报告的消息。A message that is reported when the verification rule is true. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 可以在创建实例时指定的验证规则的可选属性:Optional properties of the verification rule that can be specified when creating an instance: - 一个枚举值, 该值表示应如何解释验证规则。A enumeration value that represents how the verification rule should be interpreted. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个枚举值, 该值表示用于测试验证规则的条件表达式中的运算符。A enumeration value that represents the operator in the conditional expression used to test the verification rule. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 可访问性引用指导性 URL。An accessibility reference guideline URL. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个条件值, 它表示条件表达式的右侧。A conditional value representing the right side of a conditional expression. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. - 一个条件属性, 表示条件表达式的左侧。A conditional property representing the left side of a conditional expression. 构造函数中指定的值设置属性。The value specified in the constructor sets the property. 可以定义元数据的类、属性和索引器声明。The metadata can be defined class, property, and indexer declarations. 有关使用特性的详细信息, 请参阅[特性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类。The following code example demonstrates using the class. 在验证元数据定义中, 所使用的准则为 "WCAG"、"Web 内容辅助功能准则" 和 "ADA, 美国人"。In the verification metadata definition, the guidelines used are "WCAG," the Web Content Accessibility Guideline, and "ADA," Americans with Disabilities Act Guidelines. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[万维网联合会 (W3C)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站。For more information, see the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125). 使用的检查点分别为 "1.1" 和 "1194.22 (a)", 分别用于 WCAG 和 ADA, 以确保非文本元素存在等效的文本。The checkpoints used are "1.1" and "1194.22(a)" for WCAG and ADA, respectively, checkpoints for ensuring that a text equivalent exists for non-text elements. 应用于属性, 该属性表示另一个名`ImageProperty`为的属性的等效文本。 `ImageText` The is applied to the `ImageText` property that represents the text equivalent of another property called `ImageProperty`. 如果未`ImageText`设置该属性, 则辅助功能验证将返回消息 "图像缺少文本等效项"。If the `ImageText` property is not set, the accessibility verification will return the message "The image is missing a text equivalent." [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/cs/VerificationAttributeExample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.VerificationAttribute/vb/VerificationAttributeExample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类的构造函数指定定义验证规则所需的最少信息。The constructor of the class specifies the minimal amount of information needed to define a verification rule. 假定为实例以下默认值:The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 将属性设置为。 The property is set as . - 将属性设置为。 The property is set as . - 此属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 此属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 此属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 若要指定前面列表中超出其默认值的属性的值, 请使用或构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the or constructor overloads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `conditionalProperty`参数是另一个属性, 用作用于计算验证规则的条件表达式的一部分。The `conditionalProperty` parameter is another property that is used as part of the conditional expression to evaluate the verification rule. 例如, 如果规则参数为 , 则由`conditionalProperty`指定的相关属性不得为空字符串 ("")。For example, if the rule parameter is then the related property specified by `conditionalProperty` must not be an empty string (""). 假定为实例以下默认值:The following default values for the instance are assumed: - 将属性设置为。 The property is set as . - 此属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). - 此属性设置为空字符串 ("")。The property is set as an empty string (""). 若要指定前面列表中超出其默认值的属性的值, 请使用构造函数重载。To specify values of the properties in the preceding list beyond their default values, use the constructor overload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 实例时, 将设置属性, 并且此属性是必需的。The property is set when the instance is created and is required. 对于在[万维网联合会 (W3C)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125)网站上定义的 web 内容可访问性准则 , 将属性指定为准则编号, 后跟一个句点 (.), 后跟一个检查点编号。For the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines defined on the [World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37125) the property is specified as a guideline number followed by a period (.) followed by a checkpoint number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 实例时可以设置属性, 但此属性是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用不带`conditionalProperty`参数的构造函数, 则使用空字符串 ("") 的默认值。If you use a constructor that does not take a `conditionalProperty` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 属性是在可访问性检查点验证中使用的条件表达式的右侧或值。The property is the right side, or value, of a conditional expression that is use in the verification of the accessibility checkpoint. 条件表达式的左侧由指定。The left side of the conditional expression is specified with the .

The default value is an empty string ("").

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 实例时可以设置属性, 但此属性是可选的。The property can be set when the instance is created, but is optional. 如果使用不带`guidelineUrl`参数的构造函数, 则使用空字符串 ("") 的默认值。If you use a constructor that does not take a `guidelineUrl` parameter, the default value of an empty string ("") is used. 不检查为属性输入的字符串是否正确。The string entered for the property is not checked for correctness.
